name: 7.19 "The Gift of the Woodi" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Cliff bring to the bar?
questions.explanation:
Beetabega.

	Beetabega was a hybrid of beets and rutabagas. Cliff was quite proud of his creation and tried to get the others interested but they all thought he had gone off the deep end.

questions.text: Who had a birthday in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Kelly.

	Woody at first was going to give Kelly "The Big Book of Dutch Humor". However, the others told him how Kelly was used to more expensive gifts which Woody couldn't afford. He felt very bitter and didn't even want to go the party at that point.

the broken record.

	Rebecca was complaining about her job again. So Carla said, "Look out everbody here comes the broken record". Rebecca hated her job and couldn't wait to marry a rich man so she herself would be rich.

questions.text: Who did Rebecca want to emulate as far as dressing for business goes?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	Lilith said that it was about time Rebecca asked. At one point Rebecca was dressed exactly like Lilith, including the bun in her hair. However, it didn't work well for Rebecca.

questions.text: What did the birthday person get a lot of?
questions.explanation:
cars.

	One of the cars she got was a Mercedes. She got to the point where she started to expect a car when she opened up a new gift.

questions.text: What did Woody get the birthday person instead of the jokebook?
questions.explanation:
He wrote her a song.

	"The Kelly Song" is one of the funniest moments in "Cheers" history. It has very few lyrics and mostly keeps repeating Kelly's name. Kelly didn't get that it was a gift, so after he finished the song she said, "so where's my gift?"

questions.text: How much beer did Woody have?
questions.explanation:
11 sips.

	Sam was concerned Woody was drinking too much and asked him how much he had. He thought Woody meant 11 mugfuls but Woody clarified and said "11 sips".

questions.text: What did Carla hate most about rich people?
options: The way they flaunt their money.
questions.explanation:
She's not one of them.

	Carla and Rebecca had this in common: they both hated rich people because they themselves weren't rich. They also both wanted to marry a rich man. Carla wasn't as obvious as Rebecca however.

questions.text: Who had a nightmare about two Liliths?
questions.explanation:
Carla and Frasier.

	Lilith was a one of a kind person. She always dressed business like with her hair in a bun. It was rare to see her hair down, which was too bad because she really was a beautiful woman. She also showed no emotion in her facial expressions or her voice when she talked.

questions.text: What was the person with the birthday going to get Woody for his birthday?
questions.explanation:
Porsche.

	Kelly told him she was going to get him a Porsche for his birthday but all he needed was to hear "I love you too". Woody said, "I'm sorry did you say something after Porsche?"
